faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping takes 2-3 business days. International orders may take 10-14 days.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer 30-day returns for most items in original condition. Items must have original packaging and receipt.

faqs.question: How do I track my order?
faqs.answer: You can track your order using your order ID. Just provide your order number and we'll get you the latest status.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.

faqs.question: How can I cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can cancel orders that are still in pending or processing status. Contact us with your order ID.

faqs.question: Is there a refund process?
faqs.answer: Yes, refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after we receive your returned item.
